results.title: Tropical disease samples stolen
results.content: CDC truk carrying tropical desease samples overturned and looted.

results.title: Really strange looking man
results.content: I saw a guy and it looked like his skin was falling off, just slowly trudging down the road.

results.title: Matoke stolen from my kitchen
results.content: I heard footsteps in the kitchen, came to investigate and found my matoke missing. I heard Zombies have a thing for Matoke..like others have a penchant for Mac and cheese.

results.title: Outside the Pub
results.content: I was on foot returning from the pub when I saw a body crawling out from the ditch. It made a horrible moaning sound. I didn't stick around to look closer.

results.title: Accidently ran over someone
results.content: I thought it was a speedbump, but then after I ran over it it didn't feel right...  After I stopped, the man got up and started walking towards the car!!!  I hit the gas and got out of there.

results.title: Diseased Fish
results.content: The tilapia that fishermen were bringing in had peeling scales and were making a faint moan. Some fish seemed to be actively biting eachother. Very strange...

results.title: Holed up in Police Station - Ammo Running low
results.content: Please send food and shotgun shells.

results.title: Large group of zombies spotted in stadium
results.content: Seems to be all crawler types.  Thank god.  Slow enough to shoot easily.

results.title: Zombie Refugee Camp
results.content: PETZ refugee camp set up in the park.  Please help us protect these poor zombies from being slaughtered.  Donations of brains needed.

results.title: Hospital Ship
results.content: Government hospital ship docked in port.  Identify yourself clearly or you will be shot on sight.

results.title: Strange people
results.content: I'm staying at Blue Mango hostel which is lovely. But is it normal for people to be running around outside screaming like this? (This is my first time in Uganda)

results.title: zombie witnessed via Chatroulette
results.content: Was playing Chatroulette and this dude in Kampala totally lacked skin on his face. It was just bony and his eyes stuck out really bad.

results.title: Outbreak?
results.content: I'm here in Kampala studying tropical disease but I've never seen behavior like this. People are attacking each other! What is going on?

results.title: Mudslide uncovers decomposing, but moving, bodies!
results.content: Not sure what's going on here.  There was a mudslide that opened up an old grave site. Bodies in various states of decomposition are moving and some even standing. Running...  Dr. Ngalande

results.title: Group of 7 zombies, 3 adults and 4 kids, seen in Independence park
results.content: I was out with my kids playing in this park at around 5pm in the early evening when I saw these guys emerge from the drains near the bathrooms. They looked pretty scary but greeted us politely. We left in a hurry, and they went about their business (whatever that was)

results.title: Zombies no match for Boda Gangs
results.content: Hordes of zombies were seen being beaten up by gangs of angry boda-boda drivers.

results.title: Safe zone?
results.content: Our landcruiser ambushed by zombiles but I escaped. Looking for a safe zone? pls hlep.

results.title: Naked man seen running through the streets
results.content: I was out on my porch drinking my last sundowner of the day when I saw my neighbor Jon Gosier running down the street naked screaming like a school girl.  That wasn't the strange part though... He was being chased by 3 gimpy and tattered looking men.  I need to stick to just one drink per night.

results.title: Possibly infected spotted in Kisumu
results.content: I just saw a guy with a bite mark on his arm in Kisumu. He was trying to hide it, but I swear this guy was acting strange and very fidgety. What drew my attention was that he seemed very gray and had red eyes.

results.title: Want to escape?
results.content: I'm at Kololo airstrip. Can take three people with me to Nairobi. Tail number 5Y ZOM. Will take first to arrive.

results.title: Police shooting in Malaba
results.content: A lot of shooting going on at the Malaba border control.  Seems that a bus full of people got shot up.  That didn't seem to stop them though, as they tore the police to shreds and kept on moving...  What is going on here?   Who are these superhumans?

results.title: Zombie Attack HELP!!
results.content: I have been attacked! My whole building is surrounded by zombies!! Waaa..... Please send help.

results.title: Man sets himself on fire!?
results.content: I couldn't be sure, but it looks like my neighbor is on his roof with tires around himself a can of kerosene and matches. He's crying, "Swift could have helped! God damn PHP."  I don't get it... Maybe one more drink will help this make sense.

results.title: Boda boda ride of terror
results.content: I was crossing the border from Uganda into Kenya, when the boda boda driver started changing from a normal human being to a skeleton mumbling something about the hour of reckoning. I simply jumped off the boda boda and hid in the bushes till morning.

results.title: help needed at shopping center
results.content: 25 people (9 children) barricaded in shopping center under. Under attack.

results.title: Zombies at Kabira Club
results.content: Zombies took the Kabira club shortly after midnight.  Stay away from this area!

results.title: Weird people on Migingo Island
results.content: As we were preparing our fishing nets,we cited some people walking inside the island waters.I thought,'Jesus Walking on water'!But how many Jesus are there?Had to run back to the house.This is so unusual

results.title: Chemical Dispensary Raid
results.content: Masked men raided a chemical dispensary at 1400hrs near Dupont Circle. They stole quantities of tetrodotoxin (TTX)and datura. Their motive and goals remain uncertain.

results.title: The Heart of Darkness
results.content: Chachu Francis Ganya, MP from North Horr in Kenya, was overheard stating, "Kampala is the heart of darkness itself.  It comes as no surprise to me that this evil infestation would overrun that foul city.  God will save Kenya, and we will annex Uganda."

results.title: Lake Mburo Safe Zone
results.content: Friends near Lake Mburo have created a safe zone. We have weapons, food, water. http://www.mihingolodge.com/

results.title: Finally, a use for cricket bats!
results.content: I've come across an old building at the Kaburon Country Club that has old cricket bats in it and I even found a tire iron. The only way to stop these Zombies is removing their head.

results.title: school on fire
results.content: primary school on fire!

results.title: shops smashed
results.content: security and police shooting at looters at garden city shopping centre

results.title: traffic jam
results.content: hundreds fleeing - traffic jammed near mukwano shopping arcade

results.title: zombies at owino market
results.content: large group of crawlers at Owino Market

results.title: zombie spotted
results.content: captured on my iphone

results.title: close call
results.content: escaped attack. are there more survivors?

results.title: zombie killed
results.content: i killed this zombie!!!!

results.title: Posessed Driver
results.content: While I was driving down I-95 to Richmond, I gave the guy tailgating me the finger. He drove up right next to me, slowly turned his head in my direction and glared at me with his green eyes. It looked like he was whispering the word "brains" but I couldn't tell. FREAKY!

results.title: zombies outside hotel
results.content: zombies heading for hotel

results.title: Nasty Sunburn
results.content: A man on the beach really should go home or put on some sunscreen. His skin seems to be turning green and brown and is falling off into the sand. I kinda want to throw up.

results.title: defend DC!
results.content: spread the word

results.title: Biting
results.content: A man walking on the beach bit me. His skin was kind of falling off. I told him, "Eww, man, go to the hospital or sumthin" but he just moaned at me. I've been coughing ever since. I bet he gave me a cold. Jerk.

results.title: Entebbe Airport
results.content: Looks like an anthrax attack here. What happened?

results.title: Mihingo Lodge Sanctuary
results.content:
More people gathering at Mihingo Lodge. Get here if you can and bring supplies!
http://www.mihingolodge.com/

results.title: Mbale deserted
results.content: No sign of life in Mbale

results.title: Black Helicopters!
results.content: Unmarked, black helicopters circling overhead STOP Please advise STOP

results.title: Bole airport
results.content: Zombies attacking!

results.title: Chaos at airport
results.content: I'm outside airport and people are running for their lives!

results.title: Zombies arrive in Holland
results.content: plane full of zombies arrives at schiphol!

results.title: seriously weird dude
results.content: seriously weird / sick guy freaking out in the middle of heathrow airport. zombie plague?

results.title: Danger at Kaburini
results.content: Got bit during my morning jog through Kaburini today.

results.title: zombie invasion
results.content: help us!

results.title: girl attacked
results.content: girl attacked by mob in red light district!

results.title: tube crawling with zombies
results.content: zombies lurking in London underground

results.title: Dagoretti corner traffic
results.content: I've been stuck in traffic for 2 hours already.  Not sure why, but there are rumors of zombies at the roundabout.

results.title: Zombies on bicycles?
results.content: Did I see a zombie riding thru the Vondelpark?

results.title: Fortifying Upper Hill
results.content: We're a concerned group of citizens that have seen some really crazy things today. We've barricaded off a section of Upper Hill and taken over the British Council building as it provides the best point of defense in the area.  We need some more people to help defend it.  Bring weapons.

results.title: Zombies in disguise
results.content: A group of zombies have disguised themselves in afros on Ngong Road in Nairobi to get past groups of zombie hunting vigilantes. Strongly suggest that anyone with afro should be forced to drink garlic juice to prove their non-zombie status.

results.title: Human-Zombie Summit Meeting
results.content:
At a meeting between humans and zombies, zombies objected to the title of the meeting arguing that they are humans too. Most of the zombies present stated that the reason for so many zombie sightings was due to the collapse in employment opportunities for zombies due to the fall in popularity of Halloween. 
People for the Ethical Treatment of Zombies will liaise with pumpkin grows to start a "Buy a Pumpkin get a Zombie free" campaign for Halloween 2010.

results.title: Zombies Attacking!
results.content:
Zombies just entered the Pieterskerk in Leiden, attacking innocent churchgoers! 

AAAAAAAhh they trie to break through the door!!!!! 

HELP!

results.title: boss turns receptionist.
results.content:
my boss turned our reception lady after performing first recorded zombie monologue. he then proceeded to bite off his assistant's ear.

cleaning lady too turned. 13 people now hiding in server room in kileleshwa. 4 ran -God help their souls!

results.title: Survivors barricaded in shopping mall
results.content: Hordes of brain-virus infected are marauding up Springvale Road between rows of abandoned cars as night falls. Dozens of survivors now barricaded in the Coles Supermarket on the ground floor of the Glen Shopping Mall. Hordes are massing at the top of the escalators, but so far a barrage of flammable cleaning products has kept them at bay. Smell of burning undead-flesh intolerable.

results.title: Zombie cats
results.content: A gang of 17 zombie elephants are rampaging through the hotel grounds. Man, they're scary.

results.title: Arushian Zombie Spotted
results.content: Reporting from Arusha the Capital of East African Community. Zombie has been spotted BITING Arushians. The otherwise calm and polite Tanzanians are now as Rude and hyperactive as the Kenyans(who are already zombies)

results.title: attack by infected aid worker returning from Kampala
results.content:
0842 GMT An aid worker who returned to their NGO headquarters on an overnight flight from Kampala, Uganda last night was sighted lurching, drooling and shuffling about the office at 0800. 

This was thought to be fairly normal behaviour but on being approached the worker attempted to bite three interns, before being restrained by Staff Health... HR experts have been called in to assess the situation.

results.title: Ushahidi like zombie sported
results.content: http://www.zombiereports.com/reports/

results.title: Infected Ferry sunk off coast of Tasmania
results.content: Australian Air Force bombs Spirit of Tasmania after no signs of life detected on drifting cross-Tasman ferry.  Infected believed contained.

results.title: Suspicious activity at Nakumatt Junction
results.content: Suspected Zombies trapped in electrical room at Nakumatt Junction. The power keeps going out and the fire alarm has sounded numerous times yet everyone is going about their day as if nothing has happened. Have seen a few askaris enter Nakumatt with face masks and large trash bags... none have come back out.

results.content: zombiemap: What are the origins of the outbreak?  http://wp.me/pS8n5-3 #zombiereports

results.title: Zombie walking in Joburg
results.content: Just walking around like they are normal people! Watch out- to be sure if you are talking to a real Zombie or a person- pinch skin twice for a reaction. No reaction means he/she/she-he is a zombie. If Reaction well you will know.

results.title: zombiemap: PETAZ: People for the Ethical Treatment of Zombies denounces violence against Zombie 'families' around the globe. http://ow.ly/1tstr
results.content: zombiemap: PETAZ: People for the Ethical Treatment of Zombies denounces violence against Zombie 'families' around the globe. http://ow.ly/1tstr

results.title: It's my collegue!
results.content: I was wondering why my collegue looks so pale lately. But now I know.

results.title: #dailyquestions how will i survive a #zombie #apocalypse? take photos of them and glue them to myself so they think i am one of them.

results.title: anyone else hearing rumors of #zombie attacks?
results.content: anyone else hearing rumors of #zombie attacks?

results.title: Undermind report: JZ mum on zombie threat but urges vigilance
results.content:
As secondhand reports of undead appear on social networks, the President urges citizens to be vigilant without specifically mentioning the zombie threat. 

The arrest of train arsonists by the authorities has led some to believe that the advance outbreak-prevention sabotage team has failed its objective. 

The Undermind Group recommends gathering goods and weapons for stockpiling at secured locations with access to running water.

results.title: aid agency under attack
results.content:
due to a returning aid worker from kampala, zombiism infection spreading rapidly throughout major british NGO headquarters

attack ongoing, mass casualties

zombies currently confined to upper 2 floors of building but breakout imminent

territorial army units sighted approaching on ring road

results.title: Sighting
results.content: Multiple witnesses saw an outbreak in a Southeast Portland neighborhood. Neighbor had been sick with the flu since Monday. Police shot most of the occupants of the house after the owner bit a large chunk out of the cops arm.

results.title: Twin Zombies
results.content: Twin zombies spotted at the Wilson Airport, Nairobi they were looking for something, not sure what

results.title: Running out of cricket bats
results.content: We've been using the relative height of the iHub as a defensive position.  Zombies are dumb as hell, so we can beat them on the head as they come up the stairs.  Our problem is that too many of our cricket bats are now broken and we're running out.  If anyone has tire irons or more weapons, please help!

results.title: VW driving zombies in the UK
results.content:
I think they are using VW Camper Vans to travel around England, after
hearing the Reports from London and Oxford, I went and stood on the
A422 bridge over the M40 near Banbury to see if I could grab a sight
of these un-earthly monsters and sure enough, a VW Camper packed full
of the undead went shooting underneath my feet - I'm so scared! God
help Birmingham, I think they were on the way there!!!

results.title: Stuck in Hotel
results.content: Maybe 50 - 75 zombies are attempting to claw their way into the lobby at our hotel. SEND HELP!

results.title: New Smyrna Beach
results.content: A group of 5 zombies saw my girlfriend and I walking down the street and began running after us. Those damned things are fast! They were surely going to munch on our brains! We need food and water, NOW!

results.title: Zombies on Parliament Hill
results.content: Zombies spotted heading into Canadian House of Commons. Another day in Ottawa...
